actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: A bill to repeal the earnings limitation of the Social Security Act.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Repeals provisions under title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act which limit the amount of outside income which a beneficiary may earn without incurring a reduction in benefits.

titles.title: A bill to repeal the earnings limitation of the Social Security Act.
